        message - The MESSAGE_TO_WRITE

      • buildPreviewGrid

        private void buildPreviewGrid(int size)
        Method to build the preview grid in the Autocontrol tab
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the grid to build (ex: 5 = a square grid of 5x5) (a odd number is better !!!)

      • setStartPointButtonPreview

        private void setStartPointButtonPreview(int size)
        Method to determine the middle point of the grid and set it as the start point
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the grid built (a odd number is better !!!)

      • selectPreviewGridNeighBoorButtons

        private int[] selectPreviewGridNeighBoorButtons(int nbButtons,
                                                RobotDirection direction,
                                                int actual,
                                                java.lang.String text)
        Method to get X neightboor buttons of a button in a specific direction and affect their values to a specific text
        Parameters:
        nbButtons - The number of neightboor buttons ( = segment length)
        direction - The direction of these buttons (ex : the 2 buttons on the left of THIS button)
        actual - The button index from who the direction is based
        text - The text value to affect to these neightboor buttons
        Returns:
        An array of indexes of these neightboor buttons (array of size = nbButtons parameter)
